Locked Doors

Tense room; Dounia anxious, Svidrigaïlov intense.  
“Calm yourself. He may become a great man.”  

Dounia: “Cruel man! Let me go!”  
Svidrigaïlov: “Where are you going?”  
Dounia: “To him! Why is this door locked?”  

---  

Same room; Svidrigaïlov pleading, Dounia hesitant.  
“Wait a bit; he can still be saved.”  

Dounia: “How can you save him?”  
Svidrigaïlov: “It all depends on you alone.”  
Dounia: “One word from me, and he is saved?”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Dounia is urged to consider her influence over her brother's fate, as Svidrigaïlov believes she can help save him from his dire situation.
